div.p: The environmental covariance between strength of selection (measured as the selection gradient) and expression of additive genetic variance as a function of the environment leads to a strong relationship between the predicted response to selection (measured using a modified version of Lande's equation, see Text S1) and temperature (least squares regression: slope = −0.031, se = 0.006, t 33 = −4.92, p<0.001).
